name: humidity_setValue
description: This function is used to set the humidity level of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the humidity level.

parameters.name: ration
parameters.description: The percentage value to set the humidity to.

parameters.name: humidity
parameters.description: The specific humidity level to set.
